gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 116, Thunder 104
gameRecap.excerpt: Los Angeles defeats Oklahoma City, 116-104. For Los Angeles, D’Angelo Russell led the way with 26 points (five 3PM), six rebounds, and four steals while Anthony Davis added 24 points, 12 rebounds, and three blocks in the victory. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded 20 points, seven rebounds, four assists, and four steals with Chet Holmgren tallying 15 points and seven rebounds for Oklahoma City in the losing effort. Los Angeles improves to 34-29 on the season, while Oklahoma City moves to 42-19 with the loss.
